Destination: Hawaii

- Local Hawaiian cuisine

- Beach day at Waikiki Beach (June 11)
- Snorkeling at Hanauma Bay (June 12)

- Visit to Pearl Harbor (June 14)
- Road trip to the North Shore (June 15)
- Luau experience at Polynesian Cultural Center (June 16)

- Kayaking at Kailua Beach (June 18)
- Shopping at Ala Moana Center (June 19)

- Renting a car for the duration

- $5,000 for the entire trip

Packing List:
- Swimwear
- Sunscreen
- Hiking gear
- Casual outfits
- Camera
- Travel documents
